comment._content:
Thanks for adding this to the group.

Wonderful rural view.

comment.author: 56453971@N08
comment._content: What a shame that Sir Simon Gourlay et al are considering building a track in extreme proximity to the building - gratuitous despoilation in search of gold.  The track would be to transport  monstrous turbines to the top of Stonewall Hill.
